general.disable_global_radio: The plugin is set to 'Scoped' by default when configured under a {scope}. To configure a global plugin, navigate to the global plugin list page.
general.disable_source_scope_change: Changing the {scope} is not allowed when configuring a plugin under it.

config-certificate.help: Array of stringified Lua code to be cached and run in sequence during the certificate phase.

config-access.help: Array of stringified Lua code to be cached and run in sequence during the access phase.

config-body_filter.help: Array of stringified Lua code to be cached and run in sequence during the body_filter phase.

config-header_filter.help: Array of stringified Lua code to be cached and run in sequence during the header_filter phase.

window_type.label: Rate Limit Window Type
window_type.help:
Sets the time window type to either sliding (default) or fixed.
  • Sliding windows apply the rate limiting logic while taking into account previous hit rates (from the window that immediately precedes the current) using a dynamic weight.
  • Fixed windows consist of buckets that are statically assigned to a definitive time range, each request is mapped to only one fixed window based on its timestamp and will affect only that window's counters.

request_limits.title: Request Limits
request_limits.subtitle: Set one or more limits on the number of API requests allowed within a defined timeframe.
request_limits.label: Limit

error_message.label: Error Message
error_message.help: Set a custom error code and message to be returned when the rate limit is exceeded.

validators.date_is_late: The date is too late. Current: {0}, Maximum: {1}
validators.invalid_text_contain_number: Invalid text - cannot contains numbers or special characters
validators.invalid_tex_contain_spec: Invalid text - cannot contains special characters

shared_configuration.label: Use shared configuration
shared_configuration.description: Select an existing shared Redis configuration or create a new one. Any updates to this configuration will automatically apply to all associated plugins.
shared_configuration.title: Shared Redis Configuration
shared_configuration.tooltip: Only compatible {type} redis configurations will be listed here.

selector.title: Select a Redis configuration
selector.description: Select an existing shared Redis configuration or create a new one. Any updates to this configuration will automatically apply to all associated plugins.

dedicated_configuration.label: Use dedicated configuration
dedicated_configuration.description: Create a Redis configuration exclusively for this plugin, with settings that wonâ€™t impact other plugins.
dedicated_configuration.title: Connection Settings

custom_plugin.alert: Note: For custom plugins, we cannot determine the correct Redis configuration type. Please ensure you select the appropriate option manually.
custom_plugin.tooltip: To apply a shared redis configuration, the redis fields must defined as Kong plugins in plugin schema.
